channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Media Made Sure This Election Was Never Going To Be Free Or Fair
item.description: The corrupt news media lied to voters on behalf of Democrats over and over ensuring an unfair election. How can we ever return to normal?

item.title: Arizona county defends restoring 98,000 with unconfirmed citizenship to voter rolls
item.description: The Maricopa County Recorder's Office defends its decision to restore the voter status of individuals affected by a glitch impacting 218,000 voters.

item.title: Spoiler alert: New York inmate threatens to sink Democrat Peltola in Alaska House race
item.description: An incarcerated felon in New York could cost Democrats a House seat -- or even the House -- by siphoning votes from Alaska Rep. Mary Peltola, a scenar...

item.title: Cardi B takes heat for using phone as speech prop during Harris rally
item.description: Cardi B tried to defend herself over reading her speech from her phone at Vice President Kamala Harris' rally in Wisconsin Friday.

item.title: Media More Horrified About Trump’s Assassination Joke Than The Actual Attempt On His Life
item.description: Trump mentioned the press as he assessed his security glass at his rally in Pennsylvania.

item.title: Over 60% of homeowners go into debt for renovations they wish they hadn’t done, study finds
item.description: About 1 in 9 homeowners disliked their post-renovation home, and nearly half of renovators said they liked their home better before they renovated.

item.title: Unlocking Stock Market Success: Why You Should Embrace the Skew
item.description: By learning to appreciate positive skew and its associated tail events, investors can unlock the full potential of stock market gains.

item.title: The Stakes of the Election Are High
item.description: While I maintain faith in our system, there are danger signs.

item.title: In battle against Trump, Harris crisscrosses biggest of the battlegrounds on election eve
item.description: On election eve, Vice President Kamala Harris spends her final full day on the campaign trail crisscrossing Pennsylvania, the biggest of the battlegro...

item.title: My 2024 Election Predictions
item.description: Frankly, I have no idea what’s going to happen. But this is my best guess.

item.title: From ‘nauseously optimistic’ to ‘headline stress disorder,’ how to deal with your election anxiety
item.description: You're not alone: 77% of Americans are stressed about the future of the country, finds a new poll. Here's how to calm down.

item.title: Retaining Top Investment Talent: Lessons Learned by Large Canadian Pension Plans
item.description: The secret sauce of Canadian pension plan returns lies in their ability to attract top talent, carefully design compensation frameworks, and adapt to ...

item.title: From Tweets to Trades: The Risks of Social Media in Investing
item.description: Are you able to step outside the confines of social media echo chambers to make informed investment decisions?

item.title: Wall Street’s Latest Flood: Private Credit
item.description: Private credit is a treacherous swamp full of opportunists. Is your consultant capable of defying the formidable odds of success?

item.title: Nikki Haley: Vote for Trump an 'easy call'
item.description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley made one last push to show her support for former President Donald Trump, calling him "clearly the better choic...

item.title: Life Is on the Ballot in Nebraska — Twice
item.description: Dueling abortion referenda — one pro-life, one pro-abortion — make the stakes for the unborn clear.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway is dumping Apple stock and building its cash stockpile to record highs because Warren Buffett believes the government will raise capital gains taxes soon
item.description: The company’s cash and short-term treasuries now outweigh the market value of its equities.

item.title: Republicans sue Milwaukee over late-game limits on poll watchers
item.description: The Republican National Committee sued the Milwaukee Election Commission over a city plan to cap the number of poll watchers allowed on Election Day i...

item.title: Exclusive: Texas, Georgia Election Data Shatters Democrats’ Voter ID Lies
item.description: Data from elections in Texas and Georgia disproves the left's phony narrative that ID requirements 'suppress' voters.

item.title: Texans pour cold water on Democratic hopes for a blue Lone Star State
item.description: Texas voters don't think the state has a real chance of going blue, despite the ambition of Democrats this election cycle.

item.title: Supreme Court to consider role of race in drawing Louisiana's congressional districts
item.description: The Supreme Court said Monday it will take up cases challenging Louisiana's congressional districts, two of which were drawn to give Black voters prim...

item.title: No on New York Proposition One
item.description: It would open a Pandora’s box of evils, hasten the collapse of N.Y.’s declining population, and destroy parental rights, girls’ sports, and religious ...

item.title: Elon Musk joins a chorus of conservatives turning the euthanized ‘Peanut the squirrel’ into a symbol of ‘government overreach’
item.description: The internet-famous squirrel was seized by the New York Department of Environmental Conservation Wednesday over safety and legal concerns.

item.title: Under The Boot Of Power-Hungry Bureaucrats, We’re All Peanut The Squirrel
item.description: We must fight against a future in which the state can't perform its basic functions but has time to harass citizens for adopting squirrels.

item.title: Liberty bellwethers: Five Pennsylvania counties to watch on election night
item.description: Pennsylvania has 67 counties, but five currently stick out as the most-watched during this cycle — and they are a mix of suburban and rural areas that...

item.title: The Hidden Environmental Costs of Tech Giants’ AI Investments
item.description: Big tech is spending big on AI technologies. Training and operating them has raised concerns about environmental impact. What disclosures should susta...

item.title: NBC Forced To Give Trump Airtime After Violating FCC Rules With Harris SNL Spot
item.description: Republican FCC Commissioner Brendan Carr said in a thread on X that Harris’ appearance on SNL ran afoul of the FCC’s 'Equal Time' rule.

item.title: Remembering Ronald Reagan’s 1984 Electoral Triumph
item.description: We should pause, 40 years later, and thank God that our nation kept this most consequential man in power.

item.title: Fan at Bills' home game told he couldn't wear Trump shirt
item.description: A security guard at Sunday's game between the Miami Dolphins and Buffalo Bills told a fan that he couldn't wear a "Trump 2024" shirt at Highmark Stadi...

item.title: Wall Street’s Trump trade unravels after a shock poll dented his election odds
item.description: The dollar, Treasury yields, and Bitcoin fell on Monday after a closely watched poll over the weekend showed Harris with a lead in Iowa.
